function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failures in peer review leading to publication of low-quality or misleading research","Impact":"Dissemination of incorrect information, leading to inappropriate prescription of medication and distrust in the scientific community","Mitigation":"Implement more rigorous peer review processes, provide training for reviewers, and establish better oversight of journal publications","Technologies":"AI tools for detecting fraudulent data and plagiarism, and blockchain for transparent and traceable peer review","People":"Researchers, clinicians, and the general public","Owner":"Academic institutions, journal publishers, and funding agencies"},{"Description":"Unproven treatments being peddled by influential figures","Impact":"Increased prescription of unproven and potentially harmful treatments, leading to public health risks","Mitigation":"Public health education, fact-checking mechanisms for influential figures, and regulatory oversight of medical claims","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools and medical misinformation detection algorithms","People":"Clinicians, policy-makers, and the general public","Owner":"Health authorities, regulatory bodies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Scandals involving faked research data eroding trust in peer review and scientific integrity","Impact":"Distrust in scientific findings, questioning of peer review processes, and potential damage to the reputation of academic journals","Mitigation":"Enhanced scrutiny of research data, transparent data sharing practices, and independent verification of high-impact findings","Technologies":"Data authenticity verification tools, open science platforms, and blockchain for data transparency","People":"Academics, researchers, and the scientific community","Owner":"Academic institutions, scientific organizations, and funding agencies"}]}
